org.hps.readout.rawconverter

Class AbstractBaseRawConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.readout.rawconverter.AbstractBaseRawConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractMode1RawConverter, AbstractMode3RawConverter

    public abstract class AbstractBaseRawConverter
extends Object
    AbstractBaseRawConverter implements all of the basic functionality common to all raw converters. It does not, however, perform any actual hit conversions.

    • Field Detail

      • NS_PER_SAMPLE

        protected static final int NS_PER_SAMPLE
        The time for one FADC sample (units = ns).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • nsb

        private int nsb
        Stores the number of samples before the threshold-crossing sample that are included in the integration window. This must be a multiple of 4 ns.

      • nsa

        private int nsa
        Stores the number of samples after the threshold-crossing sample that are included in the integration window. This must be a multiple of 4 ns.

      • configEcal

        protected FADCConfigEcal2019 configEcal
        The 2019 DAQ Ecal FADC parameters.

      • configHodo

        protected FADCConfigHodo2019 configHodo
        The 2019 DAQ Hodo FADC parameters.

      • factorUnitConversion

        private double factorUnitConversion
        Factor of unit conversion for returned value of the method adcToEnergy(). For Ecal, unit of hit energy is GeV, so the factor = EcalUtils.MeV. For hodo, unit of hit energy is self-defined for hodo FADC hits. Conversion from self-defined-unit/ADC to MeV/ADC for true hits is taken into account in HodoscopeDigitizationReadoutDriver by factorGainConversion. Here, factor = 1 for hodo.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberSamplesAfter

        public int getNumberSamplesAfter()
        Gets the number of samples that are included in the pulse integral after the threshold-crossing sample. Note that this value is inclusive of the threshold-crossing sample.
        Returns:
        Returns the samples in units of nanoseconds.

      • getNumberSamplesBefore

        public int getNumberSamplesBefore()
        Gets the number of samples that are included in the pulse integral before the threshold-crossing sample.
        Returns:
        Returns the samples in units of nanoseconds.

      • getFactorUnitConversion

        public double getFactorUnitConversion()

        Returns:

      • setNumberSamplesAfter

        public void setNumberSamplesAfter(int nsa)
        Sets the number of samples in the integration window subsequent to the threshold-crossing sample.
        Parameters:
        nsa - - The number of samples. It is required that nsa >= 0.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Occurs if an invalid number of samples is given.

      • setNumberSamplesBefore

        public void setNumberSamplesBefore(int nsb)
        Sets the number of samples in the integration window preceding the threshold-crossing sample.
        Parameters:
        nsb - - The number of samples. It is required that nsb >= 0.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Occurs if an invalid number of samples is given.

      • adcToEnergy

        protected double adcToEnergy(double adcValue,
                             long channelID)
        Convert an ADC value to an energy value.
        Parameters:
        adcSum - - The ADC value.
        cellID - - The channel ID for the detector element from which the ADC value is derived.
        Returns:
        Returns the ADC value in units of GeV.

      • getTotalPedestal

        protected double getTotalPedestal(long channelID,
                                  int windowSamples,
                                  int thresholdCrossing)
        Gets the pedestal for an entire pulse integral. This method accounts for pulse-clipping if windowSamples is defined.
        Parameters:
        event - - The event containing the data,
        cellID - - The channel ID of the detector element on which the pulse occurred.
        windowSamples - - The number of samples in the ADC window.
        thresholdCrossing - - The index of the threshold-crossing sample.
        Returns:
        Returns the total pedestal for the integration window as a double.
